accessibility.question: Is the road leadin to the nursery motor able?
Is there a nursery sign post?
Does the nursery design allow easy movement of vehicles and people?

seedling quality.question: Are the seedling well positioned/well centered in the pot relative to the root ball?
Is the one plant per pot that is single, straight, sturdy and well centred in the pot?
Look for absence of overgrown seedling in the nursery/seedling carried over from the previous season?
Are the seedlings sorted into species and age?
Is there a good ROOT: SHOOT ratio (1:2)?
Are the seed or transplant beds constructed at the recommended height( at least 30cm high) to facilitate proper root development?
Is the nursery weeded and weeded and clean?
Are there symptoms of nutrient deficiences( Coloration)?
For Nurseries raising seedlings that require pricking out; Is the transplanting of the germintants to the  growing beds/pots done with great care to prevent deformation of the root system?

seedling health.question: Are there incidences of plant pests and diseases??
For any detected, pests and diseases were the?y reported to the relevant authorities e.g (KEFRI) and appropriate preventive measures control measures taken?
